title: IBM Cloud VPC docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), you can quickly provision virtual server instances and other Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) offerings. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your infrastructure needs.

section_recommended.title: Using the IBM Cloud console to create VPC resources
section_recommended.description: Get up and running quickly by completing this short tutorial to set up a VPC and subnet, configure an ACL, and create a virtual server instance with block storage and networking options.

section_recommended.title: Creating an instance group for auto scaling
section_recommended.description: Set up an instance group to dynamically add or remove instances according to your requirements.

section_recommended.title: About creating an image from a volume
section_recommended.description: Learn about creating a custom image from a boot volume on a virtual server instance.

tiles.title: IBM Hyper Protect Container Runtime image ibm-hyper-protect-container-runtime-1-0-s390x-10
tiles.description: For the IBM Hyper Protect Container Runtime image version ibm-hyper-protect-container-runtime-1-0-s390x-10, new certificates are available.

tiles.title: New -a100 GPU profile is available (LA)
tiles.description: There is a new profile available for customers with special approval to preview this service that is for provisioning instances based on NVIDIA's A100 Amperere GPU attached to a single virtual server instance. The gx2-80x1280x8a100 profile supports artificial intelligence and machine language frameworks and includes instance storage. Only Redhat and Ubuntu are supported for this profile. This profile is currently only available in the Washington DC region.

tiles.title: Export custom images (GA)
tiles.description: The ability to export custom images to {{site.data.keyword.cos_full_notm}}, a feature previously available in beta, is now generally available.
